problem_text_cn: 如图,一张长方形纸片剪去两个角,测得EF⊥GF,∠AGF=135°,则∠BEF=()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, a rectangular piece of paper is tangent with two corners, and it is measured that EF ⊥ GF, ∠AGF = N_0, then ∠BEF = ()
raw_answer: 解:过F作FM∥AD,交AB于M,∵四边形ABCD是矩形,∴AD∥BC,∴AD∥FM∥BC,∴∠AGF+∠GFM=180°,∵∠AGF=135°,∴∠GFM=45°,∵EF⊥FG,∴∠GFE=90°,∴∠MFE=90°-45°=45°,∵FM∥BC,∴∠BEF=180°-45°=135°,故选:A．
raw_comment: 本题考查了矩形性质和平行线的性质,主要考查学生的推理能力和计算能力．
